import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen(props) { const {id} = useParams() console.log(id) const product = products.find((p) => p._id == id) return (
Go Back

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
